expansions.name: Scoundrels of Skullport
expansions.overview: Adds two new action boards and a Corruption mechanic. Certain powerful action spaces grant Corruption tokens, and at game end players lose VP based on the total Corruption in play.

items.description: Skullport Board — powerful action spaces that often grant Corruption as a cost
Undermountain Board — high-reward action spaces for experienced players
Corruption Track — tracks Corruption tokens taken by all players
Corruption Tokens — negative VP tokens; the more Corruption in play, the more VP each token costs at game end
Place the Corruption Track near the board and fill all spaces with Corruption tokens from the supply.
Place the Skullport and/or Undermountain expansion boards adjacent to the main board.
Certain action spaces grant Corruption tokens alongside their rewards.
At end of game, lose VP per Corruption token held — the penalty per token scales with the total Corruption in play.
